articles.title: Chandrayaan-4 mission likely to be launched in 2028, says Isro chief
articles.summary: ISRO Chief announced India's ambitious Chandrayaan-4 lunar sample-return mission is targeted for launch in 2028. This complex undertaking aims to bring lunar samples back to Earth, marking a significant advancement in India's space exploration capabilities. It signifies India's growing prowess in space technology and its commitment to lunar science.

articles.title: Pierce Brosnan says he's heard his Black Adam character is "going to have his own show, or his own movie" and is "going to be in the next Superman"
articles.summary: Pierce Brosnan, famous for James Bond, is rumored to potentially return to comic book movies. He debuted in 2022's DCEU film 'Black Adam,' but the future of his role was uncertain after James Gunn and Peter Safran took over DC Studios. Recent speculation suggests a possible comeback, indicating the evolving landscape of superhero franchises and actor involvement despite prior changes.

articles.title: Betty Gilpin Joins Ron Howard’s Amazon MGM Military Drama ‘Alone At Dawn’
articles.summary: Actress Betty Gilpin joins Adam Driver and Anne Hathaway in Ron Howard's upcoming Amazon MGM military drama, "Alone at Dawn." Based on a 2019 book, the film will explore military themes, potentially offering insights relevant to an aspirant's understanding of military life and narratives. Its high-profile cast and director promise a significant cinematic portrayal of defence-related subjects.

articles.title: Financial Firm GFI Group Expands to 129K SF at 55 Water Street
articles.summary: Financial services firm GFI Group is significantly expanding its presence in Manhattan's Financial District by doubling its office space. The company added an additional 64,993 square feet on the 11th floor of 55 W, bringing its total footprint to 128,749 square feet. This expansion indicates strategic growth within a major global financial hub.

articles.title: Yankees Predicted To Land Superstar Slugger With $360 Million Blockbuster
articles.summary: Yankees principal owner Hal Steinbrenner addressed a press conference at Yankee Stadium in Bronx, New York, on December 21, 2022. This public engagement saw Steinbrenner speaking to the media on undisclosed matters. While the specific agenda is not detailed, such events are crucial for understanding administrative activities and public relations within major American sports organizations.

articles.title: Malayalam’s first action hero did over 100 films in 6 years; died performing dangerous stunt hanging from a helicopter
articles.summary: Malayalam cinema, since its inception, has been deeply anchored in the socio-political realities of Kerala. Its films consistently depict stories of commoners, reflecting the state's societal fabric. This unique approach means that while dramatised, the narratives offer a profound insight into local culture and societal dynamics, setting it apart as a cinema deeply connected to its regional roots.

articles.title: Warren Beatty and Carrie Fisher, Then 17, Take a Break During Filming of the Movie “Shampoo” (1975)
articles.summary: The article introduces 'Shampoo,' a 1975 American comedy film directed by Hal Ashby. It features a notable ensemble cast, including Warren Beatty, Julie Christie, Goldie Hawn, Lee Grant, Jack Warden, Tony Bill, and Carrie Fisher. Warren Beatty also played a significant creative role behind the scenes, co-writing the film's screenplay. This classic comedy highlights a strong collaborative effort among its acclaimed cast and crew.

articles.title: Here’s Why Aristotle Atlantic’s Core Equity Strategy Sold Halliburton Company (HAL)
articles.summary: Aristotle Atlantic Partners, a prominent investment advisor, published its third-quarter 2025 investor letter. This communication focused on their Core Equity Strategy, offering a comprehensive market review and analysis of the company's quarterly performance. Such financial updates are routine for investment firms, providing insights into their strategy and market outlook.

articles.title: Paras Defence wins ₹71.68 cr DRDO order for submarine optronic periscopes
articles.summary: Paras Defence and Space Technologies secured a significant ₹71.68 crore order from DRDO for the supply of two Optronic Periscopes. This contract underscores India's strengthening indigenous defence manufacturing capabilities and the 'Atmanirbhar Bharat' initiative in critical defence technology. Such collaborations between private industry and DRDO are crucial for enhancing national security and self-reliance in advanced military systems.

articles.title: Here’s Why Aristotle Atlantic’s Core Equity Strategy Sold Halliburton Company (HAL)
articles.summary: Aristotle Atlantic Partners, an investment advisor, has published its Core Equity Strategy's third-quarter 2025 investor letter. This detailed document provides a crucial market review and thoroughly outlines the quarterly performance of their investments. It offers essential insights into the firm's financial strategies and asset management, guiding current and prospective investors on their equity portfolio's direction.

articles.title: How India’s experience reflects on women’s evolving role in peacekeeping
articles.summary: The Indian Army is planning a historic move to induct women soldiers into its Territorial Army (TA) battalions for the first time. This initiative significantly expands opportunities for women within the armed forces, allowing them to join this 'citizens' army' of volunteers. This decision marks a crucial step towards greater gender inclusivity and broader roles for women in national defence.
